column4: http://ftp.ubuntulinux.org/ubuntu/pool/universe/l/lcd4linux/ <-- it's listed there - not sure exactly how to install it... can't find it in apt-cache
is i386.deb the one i want?
i'm running a low powered machine... what's the difference between the packages there (aside from amd64, think i can guess that one)?
if you enable the universe repository you ought to be able to install that with apt-get or synaptic
